detaileddescription.para: Get CellMetaData related to current mesh

memberdef.argsstring: (std::string name, const FieldManager &fieldMgr)
memberdef.name: allocate_ghosted_array

detaileddescription.para: Create a new Patch::CellArray from a global array with ghost zone The slice of U corresponding to the current patch will be exposed inside foreach_patch Only CellIndexes inside the block are allowed for Arrays created with this method : when CellIndex is outside the block (when iter_space is ghosted, or an offset was applied), CellArray::convert_index returns an index with status == invalid (no neighbor search is performed)

memberdef.argsstring: (std::string name, int gx, int gy, int gz, const id2index_t &fm, int nvars)
memberdef.name: reserve_patch_tmp

detaileddescription.para: Reserve a new temporary ghosted cell array local to each patch. Actual array has to be created with Patch::allocate_tmp() inside the foreach_patch loop. (Actual allocation may happen anywhere between calls to reserve_patch_tmp() and allocate_tmp() ) Only CellIndexes inside the block (+ ghosts) are allowed for Arrays created with this method : For CellIndexes outside the block (when iter_space is has more ghosts, or an offset was applied), CellArray::convert_index returns an index with status == invalid (no neighbor search is performed)

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::string &kernel_name, const Function &f)
memberdef.name: foreach_patch

detaileddescription.para:
Call the user-defined function f for each patch
kernel_name
name for the Kokkos kernel
f
a const Patch& patch -> void functor that is compatible with Kokkos This is usually a KOKKOS_LAMBDA that calls patch.foreach_cells(...)

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::string &kernel_name, const IterationSpace_t &iter_space, const Function &f) const
memberdef.name: foreach_cell

detaileddescription.para: Same as a single foreach_cell inside foreach_patch with no temporaries Patch policy is ignored here

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::string &kernel_name, const IterationSpace_t &iter_space, const Function &f, const Reducer_t &... reducer) const
memberdef.name: reduce_cell

detaileddescription.para:
Call the user-defined function f for each cell and perform a reduction with the provided reducer
kernel_name
name for the Kokkos kernel
iter_space
the iCell parameter in f will take every valid position inside iter_space
f
a const CellIndex& patch, Update_t::value_type& update -> void functor that is compatible with Kokkos This is usually a CELL_LAMBDA that performs and operation on a cell
reducer
is a Kokkos reducer (eg: Kokkos::Sum<double>) this is the last parameter used in Kokkos::parallel_reduce (it cannot be just a scalar to perform the default sum operation)

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::string &kernel_name, const IterationSpace_t &iter_space, const Function &f, Value_t &... reducer) const
memberdef.name: reduce_cell

briefdescription.para: Use Kokkos::Sum as default reducer for reduce_cell.

detaileddescription.para: Interface to iterate over AMR cells.
Introduces the Patch abstraction for hierarchical parallelism : patches are an arbitrary set of cells for which temporary arrays can be allocated
Also provides abstract arrays containing cells

PatchManager_t
provides the actual implementation of the Patch abstraction AMRBlockForeachCell_impl class delegates temporary array management and iteration methods to PatchManager_t
NOTE : instances of this class cannot be copied to device (e.g. referenced inside foreach_patch/cell)
